name: TBT_XS_FUNC_RTD3_PLUGIN_XHCI
summary: Set all xhci and ahci in tbt pci bus power/control with auto.?? for example: 'echo auto > /sys/bus/pci/devices/0000:37:00.0/power/control', ?? all should return success. And after idle 8s, xhci should be in D3
